option(NLOHMANN_JSON_BUILD_MODULES OFF)
option(JSON_BuildTests OFF)
option(JSON_CI OFF)
option(JSON_Diagnostics OFF)
option(JSON_Diagnostic_Positions OFF)
option(JSON_GlobalUDLs OFF)
option(JSON_ImplicitConversions ON)
option(JSON_DisableEnumSerialization OFF)
option(JSON_LegacyDiscardedValueComparison OFF)
option(JSON_INSTALL OFF)
option(JSON_MultipleHeaders ON)
option(JSON_SystemInclude OFF)

FetchContent_MakeAvailable(nlohmannjson)
